description: Old algorithms, which used to be in ATREA

algorithms.name: brta1
algorithms.description: Basic raid trace analysis v1. Mainly finds friendgroups.

algorithms.name: rava1
algorithms.description: Raid and viewer analysis v1 (vixen1 + brta1). Can be pretty slow and tends to find ones you never heard of.

algorithms.name: rava2
algorithms.description: Raid and viewer analysis v2 (vixen1 + brta2). Can be pretty slow and tends to find ones you never heard of.

algorithms.name: vixen1
algorithms.description: Weighted shared viewer analysis. Finds loosely similar streamers.
